titles: A grave and learned speech or an apology delivered by Denzill Hollis Esq; in a full answer to the charge against him, from His Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax and the army: for the clearing of himselfe in every particular crime charged against him in the papers.
author: Holles, Denzil Holles, Baron, 1599-1680.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
